JRActionLink Class Reference

A link a user can use to take action on an activity update on the provider. More...

 JRActionLink (String text, String href)

Private Attributes

String mText
String mHref

Detailed Description

A link a user can use to take action on an activity update on the provider.

Create an action link object, fill in the object's fields, and add the object the JRActivityObject.action_links array of your JRActivityObject.

Each action link must contain a link, href, and some text, describing what action will happen if someone clicks the link. Example: 

 action_links:
 [
   {
     "text": "Rate this quiz result",
     "href": "http://example.com/quiz/12345/result/6789/rate"
   },
   {
     "text": "Take this quiz",
     "href": "http://example.com/quiz/12345/take"
   }
 ]

Constructor

JRActionLink ( String  text,
String  href 
)

Creates a JRActionLink initialized with the given text and href.

Parameters:
text The text describing the link. This value cannot be null.
href A link a user can use to take action on an activity update on the provider. This value cannot be null.
Exceptions:
IllegalArgumentException if text or href is null
